q: : With the Blazers in front by seven after LaMarcus Aldridge 's basket with 1:46 remaining, they failed to score on three straight possessions. The Heat converted seven points over that duration to draw even. QUOTABLE Allen Iverson : I didn't want to jinx it pregame by saying something to my teammates, but every time he's played here, he's shot the ball well.
